boardgame.name: Man O_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; War
boardgame.description: Man O' War is the game of Raging Sea Battles in the Warhammer World. As an admiral of an ocean-going war fleet you must command your ships - which can be either squadrons of Ships of the Line or heavily armored Men O' War, in the battle for supremacy of the high seas._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players choose fleets from the multitude of races of the Warhammer world. Every ship is represented by a template showing individual areas, each with a description of the items (masts, cannons etc.) in those areas - as well as the damage that they can take before being destroyed. Each location has a value that must be rolled to hit that area when attacked, along with another value that can be rolled by the defending player to possibly prevent any damage that might occur. Ships are classified as Ship of the Line (SOL) - which are designed to move as a group of three (each moving and fighting to completion before continuing on with the next ship in the squadron), a Man O' War (MOW)- which are single ships that are much larger, more powerful and crewed by larger numbers than a single SOL classed ship, or finally as an Independent (IND) - which are used individually like a Man O' War but are more in line in strength and abilities to that of a Ship of the Line._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the beginning of each turn, players determine Initiative by each rolling a die which determines either who will go 1st in each phase - if the numbers are different, or how the wind direction changes if they both roll the same number. If the wind changes, the initiative roll and resolution is repeated until one player wins the die roll._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players then conduct the Magic Phase with each Admiral having his Wizard make one spell attempt if desired. If a spell is successful, the other player can try and dispel that cast spell if they have a corresponding type of magic to make the attempt._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Next comes the Battle phase which is based on the previously determined initiative roll and players alternate between phases of Movement/Combat, each choosing a single MOW, IND or SOL Squadron and then conducting movement and making attacks before passing the turn sequence back to their opponent. This process continues until all ships have moved on both sides. Once that has occurred, the turn is over and a series of quick turn ending/record keeping events occurs before moving to the next turn. Game play continues for a predetermined time or until one side is destroyed, surrenders or flees the battlefield._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There were two separate expansions to the main game. The first was Plaguefleet which added rules and templates for the Chaos fleets of Khorne, Slaanesh, Tzeentch and Nurgle (collectively known as a Plaguefleet), the Skaven and finally the Chaos Dwarfs. This expansion effectively doubled the number of available fleets for the game. This expansion also included color templates for the original 6 races as well (Imperial, Bretonnian, Dwarf, High Elf, Dark Elf and Orc)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The 2nd expansion Sea of Blood mainly introduced new rules for Airpower, Sea Monsters _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Beasts and Allies as well as new ships for the Dwarfs and Imperial fleets. The inclusion of the Norse fleet wrapped up the content for this expansion._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Finally, complete rules for an Undead fleet - as well as some expansion rules for a few of the other races, were included in several of the issues of Game Workshop's Citadel Journal magazine._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A wide variety of miniatures were produced to represent the many ships detailed in the main game and expansion sets but no miniatures were ever officially made for the Undead fleet. Assembling and painting the miniatures gave the game a feeling of being _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;collectible_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; as well as being a hobby in itself. Many players have created customized ships and new ships (and even complete fleets) including rules, ships templates and completed miniatures. The largest collection of these creations is housed at the Yahoo group Sea of Claws._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 13: Guilty pleasure board games

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: This is both Man O_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; War and Plague Fleet in the Man O_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; War box. The box has some wear from a long shelf life. Rulebook, counters and bits are a little worn, but not much. The 12 plastic ships comes without masts and sails. All counters and templates are expected to be present. There are a few _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;wound_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;crew_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;damage_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;blaze_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; counters missing but not very many. My prefered payment is either Paypal or Western Union Shipping will be by airmail and will cost 41$ to USA Feel free to email me other questions or other shipping costs to your country. I am also selling Sea of Blood. Buy it all and save on shipping.

Purchased on ebay but probably won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t play it so someone should have it. Box is buckled worn and split on one corner, I am 99% sure it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s complete other than missing masts for 6 of the twelve ships. The ships are unpainted and 3 blue and 3 red have been removed from their sprue but the other 6 are still in their sprue. Many of the counters are unpunched and apart from the box, everything is in great condition. Looks like the guy I brought it from played it once or twice only. Buyer to pay for Insurance (optional) but I won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be held responsible for uninsured items that get lost in the post (haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t lost one yet though). I will accept Direct Deposit from Australian Buyers

Game is complete. Partially punched. Most of the plastic ships are still on sprues. A feeble attempt was made to paint a couple ship, but not much progress. I am not the original owner of the game and don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know where the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s been stored for these past many years. I suspect a basement as I detect a feint basement smell. Box is in good shape, although quite faded. Also included with this game is one Imperial Great Ship. Unpainted and unassembled (see picture in my gallery). The ship is missing one of the masts. No original packaging. Shipping is $12. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll ship for free if you purchase this and the Sea of Blood expansion together.
For GeekAuction: User artfuldodge2

Two core sets worth of rules, terrain, counters, galleys, etc. Also includes 30+ mixed Bretonnian, Empire and Elf ships. Also a few Dark Elf, Dwarf and Orc ships, plus flying units for Elves. Ships in various states of construction/painting. Spare masts and flag sheets included. Most of Sea of Blood also included. Paypal or Direct Deposit.
Unpunched. Box minor shelf wear. Any questions just ask. Have other expansions also available.

This is a lot consisting of the base game, the Plague Fleet and Sea of Blood expansions, White Dwarf #167, 55 painted/assembled ship/flyer models, and two opened but plain original-box sets consisting of Orc Bigchukkas and Dwarf War Balloons. *****SALE HAS ALREADY BEEN FINALIZED WITH USER BoB3K*****

Played, missing a few pieces. Outside of the occasional info marker, one of the two Amethyst markers is missing. One of the displays (Imperial) is missing. I am uncertain how many island pieces are supposed to be present. The twelve ships that come with the game are in poor condition. The box is in fair condition. Lastly, there is a CD included with various player aid documentation.

Extra Ships for Sale There are 6 war galleys for each of the Empire and Pirate fleets. Ships nicely painted and assembled, but some masts will need re-gluing. Some additional boxes with painted minis, one with 3 assembled and well painted Imperial War Galleys. Additionally there are 3 metal Imperial Wolfships and 1 metal Imperial Greatship.
Complete, contents in near perfect condition. Box in okay shape.
English Edition. Never played with only small damage on the box. Shipping Costs (Germany): € 4,00

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling this bundled with the rare Sea of Blood expansion, and three _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Bretonnian Corsairs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; miniatures. One turning template and one plastic Pirate Wargalley is missing. As far as I know there are no other missing pieces, but as I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t got a component list, I cannot guarantee this. Complete listing of contents available on request. Cardboard components generally in very good condition, box a bit worn on the edges. Miniatures are glued a bit inexpertly, and some masts are broken (see pictures). Shipping to europe will be 46 €, shipping to the US will be 65 €

MAN O_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; WAR Rulebook SEA OF BLOOD Rulebook PLAGUE FLEET Rulebook Tons of Counters, Ship Templates, Cards, Range Rulers, Wreck and Debris Markers, Fleet Lists, Terrain Pieces, Magic Decks, Sea Monster Templates, almost 8 lbs of cardboard and rulebooks. Everything appears to be punched but in unplayed condition. Many cards are protected in card sleeves. *** No ships included *** I have more pictures of collection available - email c.rett@hotmail.com

unpunched, complete box is a bit smashed more pictures available upon request

RARE _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; LONG OUT OF PRINT - This is a great deal for this completely UNPUNCHED and unplayed copy of this great Games Workshop classic. Pieces were hand counted to verify 100% complete, all are new in the box unused. Box is in good shape for its age and very solid with very little wear, the lid is dished from storage though with creases on both sides and also one on the back. Can send pictures of anything if wanted. Will be packed VERY carefully before shipping (see my feedback) feel free to ask questions or for a shipping quote. Shipping will be actual cost quoted by Post Office only nothing more and the method of your choice.

Punched and complete, except for 1 mast sprue. Ship minis unassembled and unpainted. Components in very good condition. Fair amount of shelf wear on box. Shipping costs: Europe - €16,50 (tracked); €18,50 (tracked + insured) Rest of the world - €25,30 (tracked), €27,30 (tracked + insured)
Includes Dwarf Monitors and Dwarf Nautilus.

This auction provides Two copies of man o war games, Two copies of Plague Fleet, Two copies of Sea of Blood. All counters, cards, ship templates, terrain included. Everything is inside two man o war and one plague fleet box ( see images). Included are one copy of rule book for each of man o war, plague fleet and sea of blood. Plastic war galleys are no longer present instead there are various metal models (See photo)- you need to glue the sails back. You get dark elves ships, five empire war galleys, six wolf ships, skaven ships, i see dwarf and high elf ship and nurgle ship. I also have undead ship templates included.
some lead miniatures as substitute for the Basic game and BRETONNIAN-GALLION-set and NURGLE-PLAGUECRUSHERS-set included.
This game is missing the plastic ships. the box has no damage. All the counters and terrain are present.
